title: How to Make Pancakes in the Oven

steps.headline: Spray cookie sheet with non-stick spray.
Make the pancakes according to the directions written on the box.
Pour pancake batter into the pan.
steps.description: Your pancakes won't be circles, but they will still taste like traditional pancakes.

steps.headline: Cook pancakes in oven for 10 minutes.
steps.description: Turn on the broiler to brown the tops for 7 minutes.

text: Preheat the oven to 350.  Spray cookie sheet with non-stick spray.  Make the pancakes according to the directions written on the box.  Pour pancake batter into the pan. Your pancakes won't be circles, but they will still taste like traditional pancakes. Cook pancakes in oven for 10 minutes. Turn on the broiler to brown the tops for 7 minutes. Remove from oven. Serve immediately.
